content: This is a list of [airports](/wiki/Airport) in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), grouped by type and sorted by location. As of 2023, the country had a total of nine airports. Two of them are civilian airports in use (active), and seven are used for military purpose - non-civilian (not active). Singapore, officially the Republic of Singapore, is an [island country](/wiki/Island_country) off the southern tip of the [Malay Peninsula](/wiki/Malay_Peninsula), 137 kilometres (85 mi) north of the [equator](/wiki/Equator). Singapore is also a [city-state](/wiki/City-state). ## Airports Airport names shown in **bold** have scheduled passenger service on commercial airlines now.
